::Prowl/Ramulus::

Prowl shakes his head. "Icedemon betrayed the Alliance before. I don't know 
if he'll stay loyal."

He looks down at his scanner, then puts it away. "Whatever you smelled, it 
must be gone."

Prowl activates his comm-link. "Ramulus, could you patrol the Ark untill we 
get back?"

He turns to the others. "Let's go."

With that he exits the Ark, transforms into beast mode, and flies off towards 
the Cybertronian Fire.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus nods, recieving Prowl's transmission.

"We're needed back at the Ark," he says to Primal Prime, turning around to 
get back to the Ark.
